summary: Diff adds a dedicated React AboutPage routed at /about, removes About from the homepage, sets About page title/meta description via useEffect, updates sitemap to include /about, and updates the static export build to write an about/index.html via generateAboutPageHTML. However, the diff does not provide evidence that the About body content is the exact user-provided text verbatim, and the static-export About HTML generator implementation (generateAboutPageHTML) is not shown/confirmed in the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Place the user-provided About page body content on the About page exactly as provided (verbatim, character-for-character, including punctuation and line breaks), and only on the About page.
missing_requirements.reason: AboutPage renders content from marketingSiteContent.about.seoDescription and marketingSiteContent.about.paragraphs arrays rather than showing the exact user-provided About text in the diff. The actual verbatim body text is not visible/confirmed in the diff summary, so it cannot be verified as character-for-character identical.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the static export generator so the homepage static HTML does not embed About-only content and instead outputs an About page HTML artifact containing the required H1/title/meta description and verbatim body content.
missing_requirements.reason: vite.config.ts now writes dist/static-export/about/index.html using generateAboutPageHTML(), but the implementation/output of generateAboutPageHTML is not shown in the diff summary (renderStaticSite.ts snippet only shows generateStaticHTML). Therefore it cannot be confirmed that the generated About HTML includes the exact H1/title/meta description and verbatim body content.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/retained runtime diagnostics and SEO guard initialization in the main App component.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on creating /about, SEO metadata for /about, sitemap update, and static export behavior. Initializing runtime diagnostics and SEO guards is not requested as part of these requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a public 404.html SPA fallback redirect script with path exclusions and redirect behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request adding or changing SPA fallback/404 handling.

hallucinated_features.description: Static export build plugin enhancements: creates a ZIP archive and runs post-build verification with extensive console logging.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-14 requires adjusting static export outputs for the About page, but the added ZIP packaging and extra post-build verification steps are beyond the requested scope.
